title: End of season rewards question
body:
'Players issued a 7 day or greater ban from 22 august 2017 will be ineligible for the rewards'

I am seeking clarification for a unique scenario that I cannot find an answer to. 

I was issued a 14 day suspension prior to the 22 aug cut off date however my ban didn't end until a few days after the 22nd of august. 

As worded by riot it seems I am still eligible for the end of season reward?

Thank you in advance and yes I know I am an idiot. I haven't been toxic since

replies.body: He was issued. I.e still being issued. I believe it inclusive. I would send a support ticket in if rito dont respond to this soon. As the end is near.
From the wording above you should be eligible for the rewards imo.
